p: It's just struck me that I have not written you since you wrote that you had completed the corrections! I'm flabbergasted and sorry, because my neglect does not express my feeling. I was both glad and grateful. Don't send the M S until we get back in the third week of October. I'll have you send it express collect. Express is the cheap way. Mail is frightful, as 1st class rate is charged. When we come up for a visit - probably Xmas, or maybe Thanksgiving - I'll bring more MS.
I think very often about your Plan, and it
gives me a thrill. Gaki will surely love that Wub! You know I do love Wubs and always did. And this one will be an extra special.
As you may know, Oddie and I have exchanged some silly letters. If you happened to read one of mone, you couldn't know how terrible Oddie's provocation was.

We are looking forward to a good time on the Colorado trip, & they've made quite elaborate preparations at Denver. Should be quite an affair - Mama will look lovely in her clothes. I have new shoes, and will cross my legs to show them.
It seems to take longer to reach Overland by mail than to reach N.Y. Really.
